## SearchHeadless.setVerticalAutocompleteLimit() method

Sets [VerticalSearchState.autocompleteLimit](./search-headless.verticalsearchstate.autocompletelimit.md) to the specified limit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setVerticalAutocompleteLimit(limit: number | undefined): void;
```
